name: Supersponge Multiplayer Test
description:
Supersponge Multiplayer is an online twist on the Supersponge formula.

Get some friends here and have FUN!

Are you ready, Player?

Controls:

Left & Right Arrows: Move

Z: Jump

1 2 3 4 5: Taunt

X: Karate Glove

Gamepad Controls:

Left & Right: Move

B: Jump

Y or X?: Karate Glove
